summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate the cause of this failure and optimize the page to improve its load time.
insights: The test results show that optimizing images, scripts, and stylesheets can significantly reduce a page's load time. Implementing lazy loading can further improve performance by deferring the loading of non-critical resources until they are needed.

Monitoring a page's performance over time can help identify potential issues and optimize the page further. Implementing a performance monitoring tool can assist in tracking a page's load time and identifying any areas for improvement.

The "How It Works" page's failure indicates a critical issue that needs to be addressed immediately. Investigating the cause of the failure and optimizing the page can significantly improve user experience and prevent potential user abandonment.
